section.title: Description
section.p: TableTree feature that allows collapse/expand grouping levels.

p.i: Note: FDS references are in parenthesis

section.p: A boolean property is used to show/hide the row selector icon in the toolbar.using the existing property "Expand /Collapse All" to show the row selector icon,rename the property "Expand /Collapse All" in "xgui-widget-library.metamodel" to "Expand/Collapse Grouping Level"

A new boolean property is used to show the Column Selector.add a new "Show Column Selector" property to the "xgui-widget-library.metamodel" ,category "General",sub category "Table Toolbar".add this property to the "TableTree" Widget in "xgui-widget-library.metamodel".
"TableWidgetTransformer" calss in the "page-transformmodel" plugin will be adapt to generate the code as mentioned in the FDS.
